original_text: This charge I entrust to you, Timothy, my child, in accordance with the prophecies previously made about you, that by them you may wage the good warfare,
korean_text: 아들 디모데야 내가 네게 이 교훈으로써 명하노니 전에 너를 지도한 예언을 따라 그것으로 선한 싸움을 싸우며

sentences.original_text: This charge I entrust to you,
in accordance with the prophecies previously made about you,
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 두고 이전에 행하여진 예언들에 따라,

sentences.original_text: that by them you may wage the good warfare,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들로 네가 선한 싸움을 싸우려 함이라,
